params.newDstChainId: the destination chainId that was updated

params.newLayerZeroEndpoint: the LayerZero Endpoint address that was updated

params.newRateReceiver: the RateReceiver address that was updated

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

updateDstChainId(uint16).details: Can only be called by owner

updateLayerZeroEndpoint(address).details: Can only be called by owner

params._layerZeroEndpoint: the new layer zero endpoint address

updateRate().details: This function is set to payable to pay for gas on execute lzReceive (on the receiver contract) on the destination chain. To compute the correct value to send check here - https://layerzero.gitbook.io/docs/evm-guides/code-examples/estimating-message-fees

updateRateReceiver(address).details: Can only be called by owner

DstChainIdUpdated(uint16).notice: Emitted when the destination chainId is updated

LayerZeroEndpointUpdated(address).notice: Emitted when LayerZero Endpoint is updated

getLatestRate().notice: Returns the latest rate from the rETH contract

rate().notice: Last rate updated on the provider

rateInfo().notice: Information of which token and base token rate is being provided

updateRate().notice: Updates rate in this contract and on the receiver

userdoc.notice: Provides the current exchange rate of rETH to a receiver contract on a different chain than the one this contract is deployed on
